text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #Trump isn't content with killing Americans just with #CoronaVirus by delaying action & spreading #FakeNews, or suggesting #chloroquine as a treatment (likely to give you a heart attack according to the @US_FDA)...now he wants to disinfect you to death!
https://t.co/JNANEe8Ddb https://t.co/2atDrdHIPn
